title: Predicting the Understandability of OWL Inferences

author: Richard Power, Faculty of Mathematics, Computing and Technology, Open University (OU)

segmentation: So this work was done in the swap project, which ended last year.
This is semantic web authoring tool.
And the purpose of this project was to develop tools for viewing and editing our ontologies in natural language.
